title: Create/Select Contacts entry text box
body: In Windows 10 (Messages for example) there is a very nice control for entering/selecting contacts to send an email or text message etc to.  The control would allow for the use of the contact picker, but allows for manual entry and deletion of contacts.  The control would include a field for required ContactFieldTypes.  This sort of control should be pretty much a standard across all UWP apps to maximize a consistent user experience.
